snippet.title: Hot Shot Burn Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Grab your friends for a game night full of cartoon savagery, ridiculous flukes, and insane skill shots - Hot Shot Burn is out now on Steam Early Access!
Buy now - https://smarturl.it/hsb-steam

Hot Shot Burn is the hilariously violent arena party brawler that lets you compete in the universe's ultimate televised blood sport. It's fast-paced, competitive and supports both local and online multiplayer.

Follow us: 
Web: http://hsb.tv
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hotshotburn
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/hotshotburngame
Instagram: https://instagram.com/hotshotburn
